description: Master deduplication registry for all genuine results found across YEK search batches. Before queuing any result for visual confirmation, check its yek_id here. If already present, merge found_by only.

88335.title: Mizanu'l-Hakk (Katib Celebi)
88335.notes: Oxidized gold noted in catalogue: 'kenarlari serpme oksitlenmis yaldiz'. Green-tinted margins consistent with oxidized gold.

182368.title: Risale fi Tefsiri Kelimeteyn
182368.notes: Zerefsan on blue-grey paper with gold cetvels. High confidence confirmation.

175337.title: Tuhfetu'l-Vuzera
175337.notes: Mixed decoration: gold_sprinkled + marbled + colored + framing_system. Paper field: 'farkli renklerde, ebrulu, zerefsanli yaldiz cetvelli'. Spectacular specimen -- all elements visually confirmed.

155152.title: Sultan II. Mahmud: Berat
155152.notes: Ottoman imperial berat (1833). Confirmed from detail page: 'Satir zeminleri dendanli olarak zer-efsanlidir'. document_type: berat. No digitized images on YEK.

155136.title: Sultan IV. Mehmed: Berat
155136.notes: Ottoman imperial berat (1671). Classification by analogy with 155152. document_type: berat. No digitized images on YEK.

155183.title: Sulus-Nesih Kit'a (Hafiz Yusuf Efendi)
155183.notes: Confirmed from detail page: 'dis pervazi kalbur zer-efsanlidir' = outer border is sieve gold-sprinkled. Calligraphic specimen (kit'a). document_type: kit'a. No digitized images on YEK.

155146.title: Sultan II. Mahmud: Berat
155146.notes: Ottoman imperial berat (1824). Classification by analogy with 155152. document_type: berat. No digitized images on YEK.

155124.title: Sultan III. Mehmed: Berat
155124.notes: Ottoman imperial berat. Classification by analogy with 155152. document_type: berat. No digitized images on YEK.

107.title: Mefatihu'l-Gayb (Fahreddin er-Razi)
107.notes: Confirmed from detail page. 'Ilk formalarin derkenlari zerefsan teknigiyle suslenmistir' = zerefsan on margins of first gatherings. Ragip Pasa vakif. Golden-tinted margins visible but subtle at viewer resolution.

614152.title: Tarikat-i Naksibendiye Risalesi
614152.notes: Confirmed from detail page: 'Saykalli zerefsan sarimtirak filigranli kagit' = burnished gold-sprinkled yellowish watermarked paper. Burnished zerefsan is hardest subtype to detect at low resolution.

605167.title: Conk
605167.notes: Confirmed from detail page: 'Zerefsan kagit'. Commonplace book (conk). Some scattered particles visible at viewer resolution.

547179.title: Tehzibu'l-Luga (Ezheri)
547179.notes: Confirmed from detail page: 'zerefsan kagitla kaplanmistir' = covered with gold-sprinkled paper (endpapers). Elaborate floral decorated endpapers confirmed visually; zerefsan technique specifically needs closer examination.

616781.title: Divance (Muhammed Ismeti Celebi)
616781.notes: Confirmed from detail page: 'Zerefsan tacli salkim filigranli' = gold-sprinkled with crown-bunch watermark. Watermark consistent but zerefsan not resolvable at viewer resolution. Needs native IIIF or physical examination.

155118.title: Ottoman imperial berat (1569)
155118.notes: Found in 10 extra 'zer efsan' results. Shelfmark not captured -- verify on detail page. document_type: berat. No digitized images on YEK.

155133.title: Ottoman imperial berat (1612)
155133.notes: Silver-sprinkled ('sim efsan'). Third silver-sprinkled document in corpus. Shelfmark not captured -- verify on detail page. document_type: berat. No digitized images on YEK.

155116.title: Ottoman imperial berat (1617)
155116.notes: Silver-sprinkled ('sim efsan'). Fourth silver-sprinkled document in corpus. Shelfmark not captured -- verify on detail page. document_type: berat. No digitized images on YEK.

removed_false_positives.title: Mesnevi-i Serif (Mevlana)
removed_false_positives.removed_reason: Confirmed false positive from detail page verification. 'Iran isi zerefsan kahverengi deri mikleli cilt' = Iranian-style gold-sprinkled brown leather binding. Same pattern as Buhari set FPs from same collection.

removed_false_positives.title: Tip
removed_false_positives.removed_reason: Visual confirmation: NOT CONFIRMED. 'Serpme tezhiplidir' describes scattered illumination motifs between text sections, not gold-sprinkled paper. Paper is plain cream/buff with no gold particles. Semantic false positive: 'serpme' modifies 'tezhip' (illumination), not paper.
